objectives: Battleships and Cruisers at Alexandria are ordered to bombard any of the following Italian ports Tobruk, Benghazi, Tripoli, Rhodes or Scarpanto.

scenarioShip.title: Bombardment of Tobruk
scenarioShip.description: Friendly battleship or cruiser conducts shore bombardment of Tobruk, Libya

scenarioShip.title: Bombardment of Rhodes
scenarioShip.description: Friendly battleship or cruiser conducts shore bombardment of Rhodes
